name: Mngwa
description: The Mngwa is a medium-sized aberration with a distinctive Ethereal Coat that enhances its defenses. It possesses sharp claws and a powerful bite, accentuated by its grey smoke visual effect when shifting between planes.
memorable: Its ability to communicate with feline creatures and its Ethereal Step provide unique tactical advantages.
goals: The Mngwa typically seeks to dominate in combat, utilizing its stealth and agility to ambush foes.
relations: May be found alongside other aberrations or in areas populated by feline species.
environment: Typically encountered in areas with a mix of the Material and Ethereal Planes.
strengths: Notably high Strength and Dexterity scores, strong melee capabilities, and use of stealth.
weaknesses: Limited ranged capabilities and low Intelligence, which affects strategic maneuvering.
attacks: Utilizes a Multiattack, striking with a powerful Ethereal Bite and slashing Claws.
most_powerful_ability: Ethereal Step allows it to shift between planes, providing tactical movement options.
senses: Possesses Keen Smell, granting advantage on Perception checks that rely on smell.
skills: Has proficiency in Perception and Stealth, enhancing its tracking and ambush abilities.
additional_information: Ethereal Sight enables it to see into the Ethereal Plane.
Feline Passivism prevents feline attacks unless coerced.
Pack Tactics boosts offensive potential when allies are present.
Running Leap allows impressive jumping abilities.
test_queries: cunning medium-sized aberration with strong melee
agile monster that jumps great distances
creature that can shift between planes and confuse enemies
monster that communicates with felines and uses stealth
bruiser with high Strength and Dexterity scores
